name: Save the Turtles (itch) (koreyhinton)
description:
Controls: Arrow Keys and Mouse. (to get over a sea urchin stop in front of it, hold the up arrow key and then also hold the right arrow key)

All artwork was done by my 10-year old daughter
Music by me and my 10-year old daughter

I did the code (AGPL licensed  for the source code)

https://koreyhinton.com/git/saveturtles.git
